title: Mac Audit Logs - Overview
description: This dashboard provides insights into Mac system activity and security events through audit logs.

definition.content:
**Overview**

This dashboard provides insights into key system activities, network and security events, allowing administrators to track user actions and assess potential security threats.


For more information, see the [Mac Audit Logs Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/mac_audit_logs/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Distribution of Events by Event Type

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Mac audit logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
